short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate sales tax for Canadian provinces

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculate GST, HST, PST, and QST instantly for all provinces and territories. 

Features:
- Supports all provinces and territories
- Calculates GST, HST, PST, and QST
- Real-time calculations
- Remembers your last province selection
- Simple and easy to use interface

Perfect for:
- Online shoppers
- Small business owners
- Accountants
- Anyone needing quick tax calculations

Supported tax systems:
- GST only (5%)
- GST + PST
- HST (Harmonized Sales Tax)
- Quebec's GST + QST system

Privacy: This extension works entirely offline and doesn't collect any user data."
